name: 妮琪·亨特
birth_place: 美国,印第安纳州,格林菲尔德

last_movies.title: The Showbiz Show With David Spade

introduction: Lovely and busty blonde stunner Nikki Hunter was born Nichole Marie Dyben on December 19, 1979 in Lake Worth, Florida. She grew up in South Florida and sang in the church choir. Nikki began performing in explicit adult movies at age 23 in 2004 and has been featured in hundreds of hardcore X-rated features. Hunter branched out as a director in 2006. She won the XRCO Award for Female Performer of the Year in 2006 and went on to win AVN Awards for both Best Makeup and Best Solo Sex Scene in 2010. Moreover, Nikki has been nominated for AVN Awards in such categories as Best All-Girl Sex Scene - Video, Best Supporting Actress - Film, Best Group Sex Scene - Video, and Best New Starlet. Hunter was diagnosed in early 2007 with lymphoblastic leukemia/lymphoma, which is a complex form of cancer that targets the lymph system. The porno industry rallied to Nikki's side by arranging various fund-raising events to help pay for her mounting medical expenses. This in turn inspired Hunter to found C.A.R.E., which is a non-profit organization that assists other cancer survivors in the porn cinema business. In March, 2010 Hunter appeared in a PSA spot for the Free Speech Coalition on the topic of Internet piracy of adult content. She enjoys an open marriage with her husband and is a mother.
